category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: REQ_WordToHTMLTranslatorUsingLoggedInUser
preference.preference_description: Controls if the login user will be used to run the word to HTML conversion utility, the default is true. * true: the login user will be the user that runs the word to HTML conversion utility * false: the user designated during the installation will be the user that runs the word to HMTL conversion utility
